item.title: T3 - June 20, 2013 - Stop using should
item.description:
The Problem with "Should"

Jon Spencer lays out the problems with using should.

See, the problem with "should" is that it places all of teaching into rigid, binary, either/or, right/wrong boxes. It takes away the individuality, the autonomy, the creativity and the contextual knowledge required to teach well â€¦
